articles.description: The company reported a 28 percent year on year jump in its consolidated net profit to Rs 74 crore in June quarter to Rs 58 crore a year ago. Revenue advanced 19 percent to Rs 174 crore.

Shares of Central Depository Services India Ltd (CDSL) opened 1.5 percent higher after the company reported strong earnings.

articles.title: Expect a hawkish RBI in the upcoming policy - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The upcoming RBI monetary policy is expected to maintain a status quo on repo rate and stance. Rising food inflation and potential disruptions in commodity prices may lead the governor to adopt a cautious (hawkish) tone.
